author: John Lanier For The T. Times
title: School Board approves BHS/DRS grant | Education | transylvaniatimes.com
text:
After hearing Transylvania County Schools Superintendent Lisa Fletcher review the reasons for moving Davidson River School to the Brevard High campus and the need to rebuild, not renovate, the CTE wing at Brevard High, the Board of Education Monday approved applying for a NC Public Schools Capital Needs grant that could fund a 70,000 square-foot expansion at Brevard High.
Fletcher said the aging infrastructure of the two schools limits students’ success.
